attributes.action: I would like for all schools closed due to the STREP A virus cases rising
attributes.additional_details: I would be happy if the government or parliament could close the schools as soon as possible to save all children and not to wait until more cases rise…i will be happy if the government will approve this petition and close all the schools for atleast 3 months to protect our childrens lives as cases are rising everyday . And spreading all around the UK
attributes.background: I would be happy if the government or parliament could close the schools as soon as possible to save all children and not to wait until more cases rise
